Slides.title: Joyful Advent
Slides.subtitle: Prepare for the Coming of Christ
Slides.description: Embrace hope and love this Advent season. May your hearts be filled with peace and joy.

Slides.title: Blessed Advent
Slides.subtitle: Reflect on the True Meaning of Christmas
Slides.description: Celebrate the anticipation of Christ's birth. Let this time be one of reflection and gratitude.

Slides.title: Peaceful Advent
Slides.subtitle: Experience the Light of Christ
Slides.description: May the light of Advent guide you. Find comfort and joy in the promise of His coming.

Slides.title: Hopeful Advent
Slides.subtitle: Await the Birth of Our Savior
Slides.description: In this season of waiting, may you find hope and renewal. Let the spirit of Advent fill your home.
